title: Catalogue of the Arabic and Persian manuscripts in the Khuda Bakhsh Oriental Public Library.

creator: Ḵẖudā Baḵẖsh Oriyanṭal Pablik Lāʼibrerī.$$QḴẖudā Baḵẖsh Oriyanṭal Pablik Lāʼibrerī.
addtitle: Ḵẖudā Baḵẖsh Lāʼibrerī meṉ ḥamārī ḵẖat̤t̤ī mīrās̲
contents: v. 1. Persian poetry : Firdausi to Hafiz -- v. 2-3. Persian poetry -- v. 4. Medical works : Arabic -- v. 5. Tradition -- v. 6. Persian mss. : history -- v. 7. Indian history -- v. 8. Persian manuscripts : biography, romances, tales & anecdotes -- v. 9. Persian manuscripts : philology & sciences -- v. 10. Arabic manuscripts : theology -- v. 11. Persian manuscripts : sciences & arts -- v. 12. Arabic manuscripts : biography -- v. 13. Arabic manuscripts : Sufism -- v. 14. Persian manuscripts : commentaries on the Quran, Ḥadîs̤, law, theology, and controversial works -- v. 15. Arabic manuscripts : history -- v. 16. Persian manuscripts : Sufism, prayers, Hinduism & history of creeds and sects -- v. 17. Persian manuscripts : manuscripts of mixed contents -- v. 18. Arabic manuscripts : Quranic science -- v. 19. Arabic manuscripts : principles of jurisprudence and jurisprudence -- v. 20. Arabic manuscripts : philology -- v. 21. Arabic manuscripts :

encyclopaedias, logic, philosophy, and dialectics -- v. 22. Arabic manuscripts : science -- v. 23. Arabic manuscripts : poetry and elegent prose -- v. 24. Arabic manuscripts : ethics and prayer -- v. 25-28. Arabic manuscripts : miscellanies -- v. 29. Arabic manuscripts : Qurʼanic science / prepared by S. Aṭhar S̲ẖêr -- v. 30. Arabic manuscripts : tradition / prepared by S. Aṭhar S̲ẖêr -- v. 31. Persian mss. : history, biography, tales & Persian poetry -- v. 32. Persian mss. : mixed contents -- v. 33-34. Arabic manuscripts : jurisprudence and law of inheritance -- v. 35. Arabic mss. : tradition -- v. 36. Arabic manuscripts : Quranic science -- v. 37. Arabic manuscripts : poetry and elegent prose -- v. 38. Arabic manuscripts : philology -- v. 39. Persian manuscripts : jurisprudence / prepared by Mohd. Ghaffar Siddiqi & Salimuddin Ahmad -- v. 40. Arabic manuscripts: physics/metaphysics, logic, philosophy & dialectics / prepared by Mohd. Ghaffar Siddiqi & Salimuddin Ahmad -- v. 41. Arabic manuscripts: theology / prepared by Mohd. Ghaffar Siddiqi & Salimuddin Ahmad -- v. 42. Arabic manuscripts: Sufism / prepared by Mohd. Ghaffar Siddiqi & Salimuddin Ahmad -- v. 43. Arabic manuscripts : ethics and prayer / prepared by Mohd. Ghaffar Siddiqi & Salimuddin Ahmad.
